page.title: 11THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 10
page.content: spare time.Many girls attend{Brownies {and Guides},whilst boys attend {Boys {Brigade}and{Cubs}. Some children prefer to join in activites,like Gymnastics and Majorettes.Some prefer the more energetic activities like rounders, athletics,swimming and dancing . Children go to different places to do these activities like ,the School ,the Colchester Garrison ,Earls Colne sports centre and Colchester sports centre .Around Marks Tey there are several{pubs}which teenagers can go in ,but some are too young to buy alcohol .There used to be a{Youth{Club}in Marks Tey but it closed down. At school at playtimes different games are played like,' England ,Ireland' which is a jumping game, football,(some girls join in!), 'jacks,'skipping and football rounders I think the village playing field
